whitebalancing: 3000K (Default): Warm Light (Incandescent or Sunrise / Sunset Lighting), 5500K: Slightly Cool Light (Cool Fluorescent, Average Daylight), 6500K (Cool Light (Overcast Conditions), Cam RAW (Industry Standardized Optimized Color)
continuousshots: Continuous Photo (upto 30 Seconds): 3 Photos/s, 5 Photos/s, 10 Photos/s
